settings.heading: Rooted in Community. Driven by Clinical Results.
settings.text:
Silla Beauty was created from a simple belief: everyone deserves access to advanced, ethical aesthetic care close to home.

After noticing many people in our rural community were travelling long distances, often off island, for clinical skin treatments, I knew something needed to change. High-level aesthetic services should be available locally, without compromising quality, safety, or expertise.

That belief became Silla Beauty.

settings.title: Education-first
settings.text: Advanced training and continuous learning, because results require mastery.

settings.title: Ethical care
settings.text: No pressure, no trend-chasing, and honest recommendations based on suitability.

settings.title: Barrier health
settings.text: Skin is supported, not over-treated, and routines are built one step at a time.

settings.heading: Education, Experience & Ongoing Mastery
settings.text:
I began my career in aesthetics in 2014 and graduated in 2015. Since then, I’ve pursued advanced training across multiple disciplines and hold multiple certifications in several services I offer.

Treatments include microneedling, corrective peels, dermaplaning, IPL, laser hair removal, and acne-focused treatments. I specialize in acne and pigmented skin.
settings.specialties:
Microneedling
Corrective peels

settings.hero_subheading: Clinical aesthetics for long-term skin health, delivered with intention.
settings.cta_heading: Ready to begin your skin journey?
settings.cta_text: Book a consultation and we’ll build a plan that fits your goals.
